home.headline: Working women: Spiring stories
home.description: Discover the experiences, challenges, and achievements of working women from different backgrounds, ages, and professions. A space to highlight and celebrate their contributions to society.
home.organizationtext: We are a social initiative, non-profit and declared of public utility since 1986 and whose purpose focuses on integrating into society people who are in a situation or at risk of exclusion for various personal, academic or social circumstances. We promote professional qualification, with values and attitudes of responsibility and solidarity, so that people are sovereign and active protagonists in their own lives and in society. In Peñascal Kooperatiba we have as mission the integration of people, especially those in a situation of disadvantage and for this we work in their training and professional qualification, labor activation, job creation, promoting attitudes and values of solidarity and citizenship.

organization.title: Organization
organization.description: Learn more about who we are, our mission and vision, and how we work to highlight the stories of working women.

faq.a1: Es una iniciativa que busca visibilizar las historias y experiencias de mujeres trabajadoras de diferentes orígenes, edades y profesiones, destacando sus contribuciones a la sociedad y los desafíos que enfrentan.
faq.a2: Puedes contactarnos a través del formulario en nuestra web o enviarnos un correo electrónico. Realizaremos una entrevista y trabajaremos contigo para dar forma a tu historia.
faq.a3: Todas las mujeres trabajadoras, independientemente de su profesión, edad u origen, pueden compartir sus experiencias. Buscamos representar la diversidad del mundo laboral femenino.
faq.a4: Puedes difundir las historias en redes sociales, participar en nuestros eventos o colaborar como voluntaria en la recopilación y edición de historias.
